@OliverHMSmith Idiocracy. Oh, wait....

In tribute to CF, our new chickens have been named Princess Layer, Hen Solo, Kylo Hen and Chewclucka. The house is the Millennium Fowlcon.
Rogue One: where people can travel at light speed but require a zip drive atop a tower to send data.
@JamesNokise I ordered a latté in Kaikoura once - it was plunger coffee with milk frothed by shaking the bottle.
@AxleRyde you could land a light plane on that street!
@voidember @benmekler @MikeDrucker he's got the great nukes. Beautiful nukes. Best world has ever seen.
